snippet: ArcelorMittal, the world’s largest steel maker, on Thursday lowered profit expectations for the year and said it had lost $700 million in the first quarter.
abstract: ArcelorMittal reports quarterly earnings of $1.4 billion, down from earnings of $1.8 billion one-year earlier; cuts profit expectations for year.
lead_paragraph: ArcelorMittal, the world’s largest steel maker, on Thursday lowered profit expectations for the year and said it had lost $700 million in the first quarter.

headline.main: World’s Largest Steel Maker Loses $700 Million in Quarter
headline.print_headline: World’s Largest Steel Maker Loses $700 Million in Quarter
